data.name: Magnus Carlsen
data.biography: Magnus Carlsen is a Norwegian chess grandmaster and the current World Chess Champion. He was born on November 30, 1990.

data.name: Garry Kasparov
data.biography: Garry Kasparov is a Russian chess grandmaster, former World Chess Champion, writer, and political activist. He was born on April 13, 1963.

data.name: Hikaru Nakamura
data.biography: Hikaru Nakamura is an American chess grandmaster and a five-time U.S. Chess Champion. He was born on December 9, 1987.

data.name: Judit Polgar
data.biography: Judit Polgar is a Hungarian chess grandmaster. She is generally considered the strongest female chess player of all time. She was born on July 23, 1976.

data.name: Vishwanathan Anand
data.biography: Vishwanathan Anand is an Indian chess grandmaster and former World Chess Champion. He was born on December 11, 1969.
